Posts.Content: k2626 wrote: Over a wk ago I posted about a big red mark on my left breast, as if someone took a paint brush and painted the length of their pinky finger on the breast. Its still there, but lighter. Im going to the surgeon tomorrow and a little anxious, I guess its just a consult which bums me out as if it is something serious like IBC I want testing pronto. The mark as gotten a lot lighter. I know nobody is med professionals here, but would an IBC mark get lighter? Definitely still there but not as blazing red. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Update-surgeon tomorrow k2626 sarahjane7374
